column2: tmellison, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was prescribed this medication just last week in an attempt to reduce the amount of narcotic pain medications and NSAID's that I have to take for severe pain in my shoulder and neck. I was very skeptical. I'd tried other creams and patches with little to no relief. After just one application my skepticism changed to delight! Although I am not fond of the heavy "menthol" aroma, the relief I got from this medication makes it worth it!!

column2: Steve, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
Julie, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I have suffered with severe neck pain for years after working as a data entry specilaist.  I have tried physicial therapy, accupuncture, pain medications, topical lidoderm pathches, thermacare patches with little relief.  My treating physicina gave me Dendracin Cream.  I apply the cream over my neck in the morning and evening.  My neck feels warm and relxed all day.  I even feel the tingling in my skin the next morning in the shower. I don't nned those pills and I can keep working.  I thank my doctor every time I see him for giving me Dendracin.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I was injured at work and I have suffered with severe back pain, neck pain, and headaches for 2 years. Even surgery did not relieve my pain.  I got hooked on Vicodin and other drugs and NSAIDS caused an ulcer.  Epidural injections helped some. Only Dendrcin helped me get off of the drugs and get my life together.  I am more active and I feel a lot better without all of those drugs.  I still get epidural injections sometimes when the pain flairs up.

With Dendracin, I can be more active with no side effects.  the relief lasts several hours.  I can be free from the effects of the pills.
